page.description: The <OBJECT>.DATA_ENTRY_STYLE() method returns the window mode of the layout. If the style is set to "system", it returns the style as set through View > Settings ... and stored in the registry.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.title: Example
section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = form.load("Customer Information") ? ptr.data_entry_style() = "modeless"
